<S%G3767>Now<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> do <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> <S%G1096>seemed<s%> to be a <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> to him who <S%G1706>fell<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G3027>robbers?<s%>"
